vista.set
Class DataReference

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.DataReference
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Named
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataReferenceVectorMathProxy, DefaultReference, HDF5DataReference, ITSMergingProxy, LRFilledTimeSeriesProxy, MergingProxy, PairedTimeSeriesProxy, PeriodOperationProxy, RegressionLineProxy, UnaryOperationProxy
public abstract class DataReference
extends java.lang.Object
implements Named, java.io.Serializable

Contains information for referencing a certain data set uniquely. This specifies the name of the server, the filename, the pathname and the time window of the data. This object is immutable.

Version:
$Id: DataReference.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:19 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

reloadData

public abstract void reloadData()

getData

public abstract DataSet getData()
Retrieves data from the data base if data is null. If retrieval fails it throws a RuntimeException.

Returns:
reference to the initialized data set.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
true if object is referencing the same pathname in the same file

public boolean isSameAs(DataReference ref)
checks equivalency of two data references.

create

public static DataReference create(DataReference ref,
                                   TimeWindow tw)
creates a data reference similar to the given reference in all respects except that it has the given time window.

Returns:
a new data reference with the time window or null if the intersection of time window with data reference's time window is null.

createExpanded

public static DataReference createExpanded(DataReference ref,
                                           TimeWindow tw)
creates a data reference similar to the given reference in all respects except that it has the given time window. This method does not check for intersection with current time window.
